entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
